item.title: The Mailman journey for GSoC'15
item.description: The race for getting a GSoC project has started yet again. Tomorrow, will be the proposal submission deadline. I have also submitted a proposal for porting the mailman.client to JavaScript.

item.title: Hi there !!
item.description:
I had been thinking to put a blog up for the past few months but everytime I got stuck with projects, examinations etc. Huh !

Now, fest season is going on at IIT-BHU,Varanasi and we guys have all day free. I guess itâ€™s the best time to go for a blog :D
